title: PAT related to high grades in intro psych

content.question: The Psychology Aptitude Test (PAT) was administered to incoming college psychology majors. Their scores were later compared to their performance in the introductory psychology course, and high scores on the PAT were related to high grades in the course. Therefore, the PAT has

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
